a:s.a:s:
// # Introduction
// The Preventive Care logic library supports decision-making on preventive care screening for Prostate Cancer.library ProstateCancerSummary version '1.0.0'

// # Referenced libraries #
// The FHIRHelpers library provides common functions for simplifying interaction w/ the FHIR R4 data model.include
// The CDS Connect Commons library provides functions representing commonly used CDS logic and patterns.include
// The PreventiveCareConcepts library provides terminology concepts used to identify data elements throughout the artifact.include
// The PreventiveCareData library provides common data retrieval logic for preventive care guidelines.include
// Common expressions and functions for summaries.include
// Prostate cancer screening logic from USPSTFinclude
'You have never had a PSA test'

then.value: You have never had a PSA test

a:s.a:s:
// # PSA risk statements #
// TODO handle unknown FH. Research negation of conditions and unknown.define "PSA risk statement":
'You are African American and have a family history of prostate cancer. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.'
'You have a family history of prostate cancer. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.'
'You are African American. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.'

'You are African American. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer. You said you are unsure if you have a family history of prostate cancer. If you do, this also places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.'
'You said you are unsure if you have a family history of prostate cancer. If you do, this places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.'

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: You are African American and have a family history of prostate cancer. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: You have a family history of prostate cancer. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: You are African American. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.

You are African American. This places you at higher risk for prostate cancer. You said you are unsure if you have a family history of prostate cancer. If you do, this also places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.

else.value: You said you are unsure if you have a family history of prostate cancer. If you do, this places you at higher risk for prostate cancer.

a:s.a:s: // TODO handle unknown FH. Research negation of conditions and unknown.define "PSA risk phrase":
'are African American and have a family history of prostate cancer'
'have a family history of prostate cancer'
'are African American and may have a family history of prostate cancer'
'may have a family history of prostate cancer'

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: are African American and have a family history of prostate cancer

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: have a family history of prostate cancer

operand.name: Has family history of prostate cancer

then.value: are African American and may have a family history of prostate cancer

else.value: may have a family history of prostate cancer

a:s.a:s: ' whether a PSA test is right for you.'

operand.value: whether a PSA test is right for you.

a:s.a:s: 'Learn about PSA testing and think about whether you want another test after '

operand.value: Learn about PSA testing and think about whether you want another test after

a:s.a:s: // TODO: nextSteps is a list that should be customized for each patient.define NextStepsSummary:
' about whether you need another PSA test now.'

operand.value: about whether you need another PSA test now.

a:s.a:s: 'When you turn 55, learn about prostate cancer screening and think about whether you want to be tested.'

expression.value: When you turn 55, learn about prostate cancer screening and think about whether you want to be tested.

a:s.a:s: ' says that you have a history of prostate cancer'
'you said that you have a history of high PSA value (PSA value higher than 4.0)'

operand.value: says that you have a history of prostate cancer

then.value: you said that you have a history of high PSA value (PSA value higher than 4.0)

a:s.a:s: '\'s record states that you last had a PSA test on '
'. You may be up-to-date with your PSA test.'
'\'s record states that you last had a PSA test on '
'. You may be due for another PSA test.'
' does not have a record of when your last PSA was.'

. You may be up-to-date with your PSA test.
's record states that you last had a PSA test on
. You may be due for another PSA test.
does not have a record of when your last PSA was.

a:s.a:s: '. Generally, a PSA below 4 is considered good. Higher values may be, OK if they are not increasing over time.'

operand.value: . Generally, a PSA below 4 is considered good. Higher values may be, OK if they are not increasing over time.
